text: Continued use of a partnership name, or a dissociated partner's name as part thereof, by partners continuing the business shall not of itself make the dissociated partner liable for an obligation of the partners or the partnership continuing the business.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 41-157.5.

2001 Ed., § 33-107.05.

Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on § 705 of the Uniform Partnership Act (1997 Act). See Vol. 6, Part I , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 29-607.05

Current through December 11, 2012

subchapter.text: Partner's Dissociation When Business Not Wound Up.
